Articles.Content:
If I wanted to have a Real Solar System plus a vanilla ksp I would have to buy 2 games, correct ??

2> How would I keep the game data folder separate ??

Edited January 27, 2015 by Lohan2008

No. KSP does not come with DRM, so you can just make a copy of your install and put different things in GameData.

What OS are you on, Windows, OSX, Linux? Did you purchase KSP through the store or Steam?

windows, steam

\Steam\steamapps\common\KerbalSpaceProgram

This is where all of the KSP files are.

You can just copy the whole KSP folder, paste it somewhere and boom.

Inside the KSP forlder, the KSP.exe is what starts the game.
